| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                   | Type     |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- |

## Methods

### `clear() => Promise<void[]>`

Clear all modals that are displayed.

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<void[]>`
